name: RESULT_CC_RECPNT
description: Stores information about recipients to be CCd on results for an orders only encounter.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: RSLT_ORD_CC_RCP_MOD
columns.description: Stores Result Orders section CC recipient modifier.

columns.name: RSLT_ORD_CC_RCP_INI
columns.description: The record type of the CC'ed recipient for the result orders, for example SER for provider, DEP for department, etc.

columns.name: RSLT_ORD_CC_RCP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the CC'ed recipient for the result orders.
